entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
